Curry Recipies

21 Mar 2009

One teaspoon equals 1 garlic clove and 1/2 cm fresh ginger piece.

Butter Chicken

Marinade: Chicken, 200ml Yogurt, 3t garlic & ginger puree, 2/3t red chilli powder, 1/4t coriander powder, 1/2t cumin powder, 1/2t garam masala, 1/2t salt. 2t Lime jiuice
Sauce: 4T oil, 350g tomatoes, 40g butter, [1/2t fenugreek leaves, 1/2t paprika, vinegar, 1/4t garam masala], 20g single cream

Tech: Throw marinade in bowl with chicken for 1-24 hours. Heat oil with marinade until done. Cook tomato for 5 min. Add [butter & paprika], after butter melted, cook for 1min. Add [vinegar, fenugreek, garam masala, salt], wait 30 seconds, add cream. Mix together, serve.

Chicken Tikka Jalfrezi


Marinade: Chicken, 1/2 pint of yoghurt, 1 1/2t Cumin powder, 1 1/2t Garam Massala, 1/2t Coriander powder, 1/2t Turmeric powder, 1/2t chilli powder, 1 lemon juice, 4t garlic and ginger, red food colouring
Core: [2t Curry Powder, 1t Chilli Powder], 5T Vegetable Oil, [1T cumin seeds, 6 cardamom pods], 1 onion, [8 Cayenne Chillies, 8t G&G, 1 green pepper], 1 tin tomatoes, 5T coriander leaves (4 chopped, 1 whole)

Tech: Make marinade. Paste [curry & chilli] powder. Heat oil with [cardamom and cumin] for 1min. Cook onion. Add [G&G, chilli, pepper] for 5min. Add paste for 30sec. Add tomatoes cook for 20min. Cook marinade in oven at same time as for 15min at high heat Add [chicken and coriander].

Spinach Lamb Curry

Marinade: 350g lamb, 1t garlic & ginger purée, 1 green chilli, 50ml yougurt, 1/4t cumin
Core: 25ml oil, 1 bay leaf, 1 cardamom, 1 clove, 110g onion, 1t coriander powder, 1/4t cumin powder, chopped tomatoes, 1t salt
End: 100g spinach leaves, sprinkling nutmeg, knob of butter

Tech: Combine [G&G, chilli, yougurt, cumin, lamb] and marinate for 1-24 hours. Purée Spinach. Add oil to pan with [bay leaf, cardamom & cloves]. Add onions till cooked. Add coriander powder for 2 min. Add cumin and little water for 2min. Add meat marinade for 3 min. Add tomatoes, paste for 2min. Add 125ml hot water and 1/2t salt. Turn heat low and simmer. When done add Spinach for 5min. Add nutmeg and knob of butter then serve.

Lamb Curry

Core: 350g stewing lamb, [some dissected coconut, 4 red chilli, 2t garlic & ginger purée, 1t paprika, 1t coriander, 2 peppercorns, 1 bay leaf, 4cm cinnamon stick, 2 cloves, 1t cumin, 1t poppy, 1/2t fennel], 1T oil, 1 onion, 200ml chopped tomatoes, 175ml coconut milk.

Tech: Combine [some dissected coconut, chillies, g&g, 1t paprika, 1t coriander, 2 peppercorns, 1 bay leaf, 4cm cinnamon stick, 2 cloves, 1t cumin, 1t poppy, 1/2t fennel] with water to make a paste. Heat oil with onions. Add spice paste and 3T water. Add meat for 5 min on medium heat. Add tomatoes for 5min. Add salt. Add 275ml warm water and cook for 1 hour. Add coconut milk for 3 min.

Beef Curry

Marinade:
Spice mix: 4 t cumin seeds, 4 t coriander seeds, 1 t fennel seeds, 1 t fenugreek seeds, 4 t mild curry powder

Core: 1T oil, 2t (g&g), onion, 1 cardamon, chopped tomatoes, 1T tomato puree, 1t sugar
End: Corainder leaves

Tech: Heat spices, mortar. [1T oil, 2t (g&g), onion, 1 cardamon, bit spices] for 8 min. chicken. tomatoe puree and chopped.
